title: long_mris_slopes
description: Computes slope maps (e.g., of thickness) in a longitudinal study using FreeSurfer

qdec.title: QDEC Table File
qdec.description: (REQUIRED) QDEC table file specifying the subjects and time points

hemi.title: Hemisphere
hemi.description: (REQUIRED) Run one hemisphere: lh or rh or both

sd.title: Subjects Directory
sd.description: (REQUIRED) Full path to FreeSurfer subjects directory

do_avg.title: Compute Temporal Average
do_avg.description: Compute and output the temporal average

do_pc1fit.title: Compute Percent Change Fit
do_pc1fit.description: Compute and output the percent change (w.r.t. tp1 from linear fit)

do_pc1.title: Compute Percent Change
do_pc1.description: Compute and output the percent change (w.r.t. tp1)

do_spc.title: Compute Symmetrized Percent Change
do_spc.description: Compute and output the symmetrized percent change (w.r.t. temporal average)

do_stack.title: Save Stacked File
do_stack.description: Save the stacked within subject file (time series)

do_label.title: Compute Intersected Cortex Label
do_label.description: Compute and output intersected cortex label

qcache.title: QCache Target
qcache.description: Create cache for QDEC (resample to subject <QCACHE>, e.g. fsaverage)

resid.title: Residual Time Point
resid.description: Residual time point (pass 1 for tp1 etc., pass 0 for average) to export

fwhm.title: Smoothing FWHM
fwhm.description: Smoothing at specific FWHM (required for percent change)

time.title: Time Column Variable
time.description: Variable name for time column variable (e.g. age) in QDEC table

generic_time.title: Generic Time Ordering
generic_time.description: Time points are ordered in QDEC file, assume time=1,2,3...

in_label.title: Input Label
in_label.description: Use pre-existing label for smoothing and to mask the output

jac.title: Correct Jacobian
jac.description: Use this flag when mapping area or volume maps to correct Jacobian

name_avg.title: Filename for Temporal Average
name_avg.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store temporal average

name_pc1fit.title: Filename for Percent Change Fit
name_pc1fit.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store percent change fit

name_pc1.title: Filename for Percent Change
name_pc1.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store percent change

name_spc.title: Filename for Symmetrized Percent Change
name_spc.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store symmetrized percent change

out_stack.title: Filename for Stacked Measure
out_stack.description: Filename to store stacked measure file

out_label.title: Output Label Filename
out_label.description: Filename to store within-subject intersected cortex labels
